title: Bone Garden
description: -A Death Blooms World Novel-Needed: One dedicated, loving, protective, Dominant owner. A forever home is my dearest wish. Will do whatever it takes to become your perfect "pet."Wanted: One playful, adventurous, sexy, submissive "puppy.”A forever “pet” is my deep desire. As long as the “pet” isn't too curious ... and always stays away from the garden.
author: Cole Denton
